body:
Hello All,

Does anyone know of a reliable way to use BTDF data with Radiance
simulations?

I am currently working on complex fenestration systems, which I have BTDF
data for, and am looking to asses those technologies via modeling with
Radiance.

How can Radiance deal with BTDF data?



Thanks in advance,



Guedi Capeluto

Technion IIT
